title: When WW uses Predator
body:
https://i.imgur.com/SOlFHMJ.jpg

**IT'S A DOUBLE DOSE OF DOGGO**

replies.body: lmfao, get dead man's, predator, and his w going on someone and then you're sonic
Throw in a lulu, zilean, sivir, shurelyas reverie, righteous glory, mobis, ghostblade, and some other minor items all following a Kled and I'd call it good.

> [{quoted}](name=DimirWaterbender,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KOLcu0rB,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2018-04-22T18:16:17.284+0000)
>
> Throw in a lulu, zilean, sivir, shurelyas reverie, righteous glory, mobis, ghostblade, and some other minor items all following a Kled and I'd call it good.

Fun fact, after you break kleds MS his ult DOES NOT make you go any faster. In increases the speed floor, not ceiling. A Nami would do better.

The more you know.
Kled's boost doesn't go above a certain number though. With that many other speed-ups, his would end up doing nothing.
I´d call that some Aurelion E lookalike......with the added benefit of WW´s ulti if it collides with something......and several times faster.
Should you do all that, but for {{champion:120}}?

> [{quoted}](name=WayOfTheOutlaw,realm=NA,application-id=Ir7ZrJjF,discussion-id=KOLcu0rB,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-04-22T15:24:52.906+0000)
>
> lmfao, get dead man's, predator, and his w going on someone and then you're sonic

True true.
predator+ {{item:3117}} {{item:3742}} {{item:3800}}  you can ult jump so damn far
